tables.navigation:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_navigation` (
  `nav_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `is_system` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `is_admin` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `nav_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `module_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'core',
  PRIMARY KEY (`nav_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.navigation_item:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_navigation_item` (
  `item_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `nav_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `is_active` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `sort_order` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '99',
  `module_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'core',
  `item_name` varchar(32) DEFAULT '',
  `parent_name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `item_type` enum('static','route','separator','event') DEFAULT 'static',
  `event` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `acl` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `route` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `params_text` varchar(200) DEFAULT '',
  `query_text` varchar(200) DEFAULT '',
  `extra_text` varchar(200) DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`item_id`),
  KEY `nav_id` (`nav_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
